channel.title: (Client) Friend's List Image
channel.description:
Im just fooling around with editing my Client, Tried to edit Sprite....
2000 & 2005.
Sprite 2000: Looks fine on its own, But sprite 2005.... [img]http://i36.tinypic.com/95r3go.jpg[/img]
Looks like this when i place cursor over it. [img]http://i37.tinypic.com/2uj6135.jpg[/img]
Can anyone point me in the right direction on whats gone wrong here :/
Appreciated :)

item.title: (Client) Friend's List Image
item.dc:creator: @elyad elyad
item.description:
@elyad wrote:

Yeah to be honist mate, Ive never touched sprites untill today. And i’ve not even fooled around with anything RSC Related in over a year. So im rusty. Just fooling with sprites since ive got alot of spare time on my hands.

I’ll have a look, Thanks for your input

Read full topic

item.title: (Client) Friend's List Image
item.dc:creator: @dimebagx dimebagx
item.description:
@dimebagx wrote:

xShift and yShift values,

@Elyad

I can’t reply to pm’s,

It might be shiftx, shifty, it look’s like it, it’s located in the sprite editor when you load the sprite, and you set it there,
I thinks it’s how many pixels or the pixel measurment whatever it’s shifted over x and y from (0,0)
In your case it looks like shiftX needs to be increased. I may be wrong, as it wouldn’t make sence if you edited the original picture and didn’t change the values, but im also not too familiar with using the sprite editor, only thought that comes to mind,
Oh actually, in the client look for spriteMediaStart + 5 , and figure out where it’s drawn.

Read full topic
